text:
69% of consumers say they trust recommendations from influencers over information from a brand. But what if that influencer isnâ€™t real?

I'm not talking about some clunky 3D avatar or robotic CGI face. I'm talking about AI digital personalities: completely customizable, hyper-realistic, and always available to create content.

I know what you might be thinking: can an AI influencer connect with real people? Thatâ€™s exactly what I set out to explore with The Influencer AI, a tool that lets you create your virtual brand ambassador in minutes. Needless to say, I was curious and a little skeptical to see how it stacked up.

In this review of The Influencer AI, I'll discuss the pros and cons, what it is, who it's best for, and its key features. Then, I'll show you how I used The Influencer AI to generate this AI influencer in minutes:

The Influencer AI

Watch this video on YouTube

Looks pretty convincing, right?

I'll finish the article by comparing The Influencer AI with my top three alternatives (Generated Photos, Glambase, and Personal AI).

Whether you're a marketer, creator, or business owner with no time to coordinate a photoshoot, The Influencer AI might be the secret weapon you've been missing. Let's see if it's right for you.

Verdict

The Influencer AI is an affordable, scalable way to maintain consistent online branding with customizable AI influencers. While it may lack the authenticity of human influencers and require a skilled team to use effectively, itâ€™s a powerful tool for AI-driven marketing.

What is The Influencer AI?

The Influencer AI is a platform that creates AI influencers (digital personas designed to promote products and engage with audiences on social media). They're just like human influencers but entirely generated with artificial intelligence.

These AI influencers are programmed to simulate human behavior and appearance. The Influencer AI creates consistent virtual personas, generates images and videos, and makes content creation faster by skipping the long steps involved with traditional influencer marketing.

The thing about The Influencer AI is it's not just some basic avatar generator. It creates photorealistic people who can star in your marketing campaigns, social media posts, and video content without ever stepping foot in a studio.

Its core purpose is pretty straightforward: democratize influencer marketing for businesses that can't afford to hire traditional influencers. Instead of paying thousands for a single campaign, you create your own virtual influencer who's available 24/7.

Photo Generation Features

The Influencer AI's photo generation capabilities are where it really stands out. You can create studio-quality portraits, lifestyle images, product shots, and more.

But what sets it apart from basic AI image generators is the consistency. Your AI influencer looks like the same person across hundreds of different photos. The facial recognition technology maintains features, expressions, and even subtle details like freckles or dimples.

Video Creation & Voice Synthesis

The video creation feature is a game-changer. Your AI influencer can react to prompts and simulate different emotions convincingly. You can even get your AI influencer to deliver scripted content in whatever voice you choose with accurate lip-syncing.

Target Audience & Use Cases

Small businesses are the sweet spot for this platform. E-commerce stores, local service providers, SaaS companies, basically anyone who needs consistent content but lacks the budget for traditional influencer partnerships.

The beauty of The Influencer AI is in its scalability. One AI influencer can create content for multiple platforms, languages, and demographics without the logistical nightmare of coordinating human talent.

Unique Selling Proposition

What makes The Influencer AI different from competitors is its focus on long-term brand building rather than one-off content creation. You're not just making videos, you're developing a virtual brand ambassador with a consistent personality, appearance, and communication style.

Compared to traditional influencer marketing, the cost savings are dramatic. Instead of spending $5,000-$50,000 per campaign, you're looking at a monthly subscription cost that's less than $100 per month for unlimited content creation.

Who is The Influencer AI Best For?

Here's who The Influencer AI is best for:

E-commerce brands can use The Influencer AI to generate high-quality product imagery, lifestyle content, and promotional visuals without relying on expensive photoshoots or models.

Small businesses can use The Influencer AI to create professional content that boosts their online presence and engagement, even with limited marketing budgets.

SaaS companies can use The Influencer AI to sell their products through relatable, human-like digital ambassadors.

Marketing managers can use The Influencer AI to quickly test campaign variations, produce personalized content at scale, and keep a consistent brand image across platforms.

Content creators can use The Influencer AI to build their digital personas and streamline content creation workflows.

The Influencer AI Key Features

Here are The Influencer AI's key features you should be aware of:

Custom AI Influencer Creation: Create consistent, realistic AI influencers by selecting traits, uploading photos, or using templates. These AI models maintain the same identity across all generated media to maintain brand consistency.

Photo & Video Generation: Generate professional photos and short videos featuring AI influencers in various settings, styles, and scenarios.

Product Showcase Integration: Create virtual product try-ons, lifestyle images, and promotional content. This allows the AI influencers to showcase products realistically across multiple scenarios.

Voice & Lip Sync Video: The Influencer AI can create lip-synced videos with multiple voice options. This allows you to create engaging talking-head content featuring the AI influencer.

Commercial Usage Rights: Retain full commercial rights to all AI models, images, and videos you generate with The Influencer AI. Feel free to use your content for marketing and promotions without restrictions.

Cost Efficiency & Scalability: Significantly reduce production costs compared to traditional photoshoots by generating unlimited campaign variations without hiring multiple models or traveling to locations.

Consistent Character Portrayal for Strong Branding: Maintain consistency across all content formats for stronger brand recognition.

How to Use The Influencer AI

Here's how I used The Influencer AI to generate an AI influencer in minutes:

Create an Account Start Creating an AI Influencer Use the AI Influencer Builder Describe Your AI Influencer Create Your AI Influencer Generate Photos & Videos Generate Photos with a Text Prompt Turn a Photo into a Video Crop the Video Add a Prompt & Generate

Step 1: Create an Account

I started by going to theinfluencer.ai and selecting â€œLog Inâ€ on the top right.

Step 2: Start Creating an AI Influencer

After creating an account, I was taken to my dashboard. In the center, I hit â€œGet Startedâ€ to start creating my first AI Influencer.

Step 3: Use the AI Influencer Builder

Next, I was presented with four options:

AI Influencer Builder: Create an influencer from scratch. Your AI Clone: Upload an image of an influencer. Pre-made Model: Select a pre-made influencer. New Product: Create a product to sell.

I selected the first option: creating an influencer from scratch.

Step 4: Describe Your AI Influencer

The first step was outlining what my AI influencer would look like by providing the following information:

Influencer's name

Gender

Ethnicity

Age

Eye colour

Hair length

Hair style

Hair colour

Body type

I made my AI influencer a female named Jade and kept everything else on â€œRandom.â€ But if you have a specific idea for an influencer, feel free to choose from the options. There's lots to choose from!

I hit â€œGenerate Previewâ€ at the bottom.

Step 5: Create Your AI Influencer

Immediately, The Influencer AI generated a randomized photo of a female named Jade in the preview area on the right. I was impressed with how quickly the image was generated and how real she looked.

Below the image, I hit â€œCreate AI Influencer.â€

Step 6: Generate Photos & Videos

Selecting â€œCreate AI Influencerâ€ initiated a training process that lasted approximately five minutes. Once complete, my influencer was ready to generate photos and videos, and I selected them from my dashboard.

Step 7: Generate Photos with a Text Prompt

The first thing I did was generate photos by adding a text prompt describing what I wanted to create. I wrote â€œA woman wearing a black baseball cap.â€

From there, I chose the aspect ratio and the number of generations I wanted to create (between 2 and 32) and hit â€œGenerate Photos.â€

A few seconds later, four high-quality images of my influencer wearing a black baseball cap were generated! I was impressed with the quality and the variety of different angles captured in each shot.

Step 8: Turn a Photo into a Video

Hovering over each of the photos presented different options:

Add the photo to favorites

Download the photo

Turn the photo into a video

Copy the prompt to my clipboard

Delete the photo

I wanted to turn my photo into a video, so I selected the small video icon.

Step 9: Crop the Video

When turning an AI influencer image into a video, the first step was cropping:

Landscape (16:9)

Portrait (9:16)

Square (1:1)

I kept mine on â€œLandscape,â€ but make sure you choose the crop that makes the most sense for the platform you will be posting the video to.

Step 10: Add a Prompt & Generate

The final step was choosing the video length (5 or 10 seconds) and providing a video generation prompt describing how I wanted the video to animate.

I chose 5 seconds and wrote â€œA woman turning her head and smiling,â€ and hit â€œGenerate Video.â€

A few minutes later, my video was generated. Here's how it came out:

The Influencer AI

Watch this video on YouTube

I was really impressed with how the video came out. Not only did the AI influencer in the video look like the images I had generated, but the video itself looked very realistic.

Overall, The Influencer AI made it easy and fun to bring my vision of an AI influencer to life from scratch. I was impressed by how fast and realistic the photo and video generations were throughout the process.

Top 3 The Influencer AI Alternatives

Here are the best alternatives for The Influencer AI.

The first alternative Iâ€™d recommend is Generated Photos. Generated Photos creates realistic images of virtual people for brands and creators needing consistent visuals for marketing and content.

Generated Photos stands out with its ease of use. It's great for anyone wanting to create customizable virtual models without complicated advanced features.

Meanwhile, The Influencer AI builds consistent, branded digital personalities with more advanced features (e.g., video generation, voice/lip-sync, and commercial usage rights). These features are better for brands looking to build a long-term influencer presence.

For fast, customizable AI model image generation, choose Generated Photos. For consistent AI influencer creation and more advanced content creation tools, choose The Influencer AI!

The next alternative Iâ€™d recommend is Glambase. Glambase lets you create, customize, and monetize AI influencers. These AI influencers come with personality traits, bios, and the ability to generate posts, images, and videos.

What stands out about Glambase is its strong focus on monetization and autonomous interaction. With Glambase, you can set up AI influencers to chat with audiences, sell exclusive content, and generate income, even when you're not actively managing the account. Glambase even has a monetization dashboard with real-time analytics and multiple cash-out options.

Meanwhile, The Influencer AI stands out with its affordability and unlimited content creation. It's great for marketing managers and businesses looking to create scalable digital content.

For creators and entrepreneurs prioritizing hands-off monetization, analytics, and unique digital influencer personalities, choose Glambase. For marketing teams and brands seeking affordable and scalable AI influencer content, choose The Influencer AI!

The final The Influencer AI alternative Iâ€™d recommend is Personal AI. It lets brands create and use AI teammates as digital representatives for roles like marketing, HR, operations, and more.

Unlike other AI influencer tools that focus more on visuals and content creation, Personal AI helps teams work faster, share knowledge, and collaborate with AI. You can create multiple AI personas for different roles and use them daily to boost productivity.

Personal AI creates role-based personas that collaborate and chat with your team in DMs or group channels. It emphasizes privacy, security, and compliance, offering SOC 2, HIPAA, and GDPR certifications for data protection.

Meanwhile, The Influencer AI focuses on creating realistic AI influencers. Once created, you can generate realistic images and videos to share online.

For generating realistic images and videos from AI influencers for marketing and social media, choose The Influencer AI. For building an AI workforce and streamlining internal operations, choose Personal AI!

The Influencer AI Review: The Right Tool For You?

After creating an AI influencer and generating content using The Influencer AI, I can confidently say it exceeded my expectations. I started with a simple idea and ended up with a fully functional digital persona that generated lifelike photos and engaging videos in minutes. It was easy, intuitive, and surprisingly fun.

What I loved most was the realism and consistency. Jade didnâ€™t just look real; she moved and smiled like a real person. As someone on a tight budget, having an entire digital influencer available 24/7 to create content is a game-changer.

However, my biggest concern is the ethics behind AI influencers and how easy it is to fool people into thinking they are real. While the realism is impressive, it's also a little unsettling.

If you're looking for a tool that simplifies content creation while keeping things consistent, The Influencer AI might be exactly what you need. But it's not for everyone, so here are the alternatives I'd recommend:

Generated Photos is best for creating quick, customizable AI model images without advanced features.

Glambase is best for creators and entrepreneurs who want monetization tools, real-time analytics, and autonomous influencer interactions.

Personal AI is best for teams that want role-based AI assistants to boost productivity and collaborate internally.

Thanks for reading my The Influencer AI review! I hope you found it helpful.

You can try The Influencer AI risk-free for seven days. Test it for yourself and see how you like it!
